Name: MPX:GFP
Details: Neutrophils labeled with green fluorescent protein (GFP).

Name: CMV:GFP-Lc3
Details: Lc3 protein,  an autophagy marker,  labeled with green fluorescent protein (GFP).

Name: Olig2:GFP
Details: Oligodendrocytes labeled with green fluorescent protein (GFP).

Name: BRN3C:GFP
Details: GFP expression in ciliated cells, driven by the brn3c promoter.

Name: NeuroD:GFP
Details: Enhanced GFP (eGFP) expression in differentiating neurons of the central nervous system.

Name: TNF-a:GFP
Details: Cells expressing TNF-alpha labeled with green fluorescent protein (GFP).

Name: GFAP:GFP
Details: Astrocytes labeled with green fluorescent protein (GFP).

Name: Fli1a:GFP
Details: Vascular endothelial cells labeled with green fluorescent protein (GFP).

Name: IL1B:GFP
Details: Cells expressing IL-1 beta labeled with green fluorescent protein (GFP).

Name: Mpeg:mCherry
Details: Macrophages labeled with membrane-bound mCherry (red fluorescent protein).

Name: b-actin:mCherry-Lc3
Details: Lc3 protein,  an autophagy marker, fused to mCherry (red fluorescent protein) under the beta-actin promoter.

Name: Kdrl:mCherry
Details: Membrane-bound mCherry (red fluorescent protein) expression in vascular endothelial cells.

Name: Kdrl:mTurquoise
Details: mTurquoise expression in vascular endothelial cells.

Name: MNX1:RFP
Details: Red fluorescent protein (RFP) expression in motor neurons

Name: LysC:CFP-NTR MMP9-
Details: Neutrophils labeled with cyan fluorescent protein (CFP) and nitroreductase (NTR) for ablation studies.  MMP9-mCirtine negative.

Name: Lyve1:dsRed
Details: Lymphatic endothelial cells labeled with dsRed (red fluorescent protein).

Name: Myd88 +/-
Details: Heterozygous myd88 mutant; MyD88 protein is involved in signaling from PAMP-recognizing receptors (e.g. TLRs)

Name: Xla.Eef1a1:mlsEGFP
Details: Enhanced GFP (eGFP) expression targeted to mitochondria.

Name: Wet-Aqua pink WT
Details: Pink-labeled companion fish in a wild-type (striped) background, used for genotyping purposes.

Name: Wet-Aqua pink Casper
Details: Pink-labeled companion fish in a Casper (transparent) background, used for genotyping purposes.

Name: GCaMP
Details: Calcium sensor (GCaMPG5  green) expressed in neurons

Name: l-fabp:DBP-EGFP
Details: Vitamin D-binding protein in plasma fused to enhanced green fluorescent protein (EGFP), resulting in green plasma phenotype.

Name: myl7:EGFP
Details: green fluorescent protein (EGFP) expression in cardiac muscle cells (cardiomyocytes).

Name: myl7:mRFP
Details: Red fluorescent protein (mRFP) expression in cardiac muscle cells (cardiomyocytes).

Name: MPX:GFP - Mpeg:mCherry
Details: Neutrophils labeled with GFP and macrophages labeled with mCherry (red fluorescent protein).

Name: Kdrl:mTurquoise - Mpeg:mCherry
Details: Vascular endothelial cells labeled with mTurquoise and macrophages labeled with mCherry (red fluorescent protein).

Name: Myd88 +/- CMV:GFP-Lc3
Details: Heterozygous myd88 mutant in a CMV:GFP-Lc3 background; Lc3 protein (autophagy marker) labeled with GFP

Name: LysC:CFP-NTR MMP9+
Details: Neutrophils labeled with CFP (cyan) and nitroreductase (NTR) for ablation studies, and mature neutrophils (MMP9-positive) labeled with Citrine (yellow) in the tail fin epithelium, distal intestine, and a dotted pattern along the head, yolk, and caudal hematopoietic tissue (CHT).

Name: Empty Vector
Details: Cas9 and mCherry (via 2A peptide) expressed in neutrophils under the LyzC promoter, combined with the mpx:GFP line labeling neutrophils with GFP.

Name: Kdrl:mCherry - l-fabp:DBP-eGFP
Details: Vascular endothelial cells labeled with mCherry (red fluorescent protein), and vitamin D-binding protein in plasma fused to enhanced green fluorescent protein (EGFP), resulting in green plasma phenotype.

Name: kdrl:mCherry-CAAX - cd41:GFP
Details: Membrane-bound mCherry in vascular endothelial cells, hematopoietic and progenitor cells with low green fluorescence, and thrombocytes with high green fluorescence (EGFP).
